ModMetaData.name: DH Additional Augments
ModMetaData.author: DigitalHare
ModMetaData.description: Reviving the augments and implants from the 1.0/1.1 Avali race mod by Eriss and Ksisa, Additional Augments adds a few helpful implants. Heating and cooling augments, vision and hearing boosters (Works with bionics already installed) and NANOMACHINES, SON.. Which help fend against diseases.
